channel.title: Need help with ip adress
channel.description: :( Everytime I run server it says 0.0.0.0.43594 and my brother tried to do 0.0.0.0 and 43594 port and it wouldnt let him in. I tried making it plutoscape.no-ip.info =\ could someone please tell me what to do? Oh and also how do i make my skills go up? btw i use testscape... How do i spawn items? And also how do i get it on the server status list? And how do i give myself a gold crown? lol im dumb, go ahead, say it

item.title: Need help with ip adress
item.description:
@127.0.0.1 wrote:

testscape you cant do like that for player rights u have to do something else but i forgot

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ip adress
item.dc:creator: @fusionflamar fusionflamar
item.description:
@fusionflamar wrote:

[quote=“KingCjownz, post:8, topic:87306”]you need to go into your character files and edit your file or w/e file you want to edit.

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3251 character-posy = 3434 character-rights = 1 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070301 character-energy = 16 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 1082[/quote]
(character-rights = 1) Change the 1 to 3 if you want to be the owner/admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ip adress
item.dc:creator: @buddybingo buddybingo
item.description:
@buddybingo wrote:

soo could i have a link to an easy one? i mean like this is hard.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2007, 10:50:15 PM[/size][hr]Ok im using testscape. I have hamachi, the ip is plutoscape.no-ip i also registered an ip.info i got it up there i can choose online or ofline. I got it online. I got to rune server ( test scape ) and it says 0.0.0.0:43594 then i go to edit rune server and i put in plutoscape.no-ip.info okay cool, i did
it, but wait! no i didnt! when i log in it just says it couldnt find it. Ok i copied and pasted your thing
and put 3 instead of 1… well i dont got a gold crown or nothing? please tell me what im doing wrong.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2007, 10:57:55 PM[/size][hr]Oh i think i know why admin is not working, its not saving right for some odd reason? i think

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ip adress
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

you need to go into your character files and edit your file or w/e file you want to edit.

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3251 character-posy = 3434 character-rights = 1 <<< edit this character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070301 character-energy = 16 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 1082
1 = player|2 = player mod|3 = admin

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ip adress
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

If you have Hamachi, your IP shown at the top of the box, is the IP you log into so, an example is…

Starting PimpScape server on 0.0.0.0:5555

You replace the 0’s with the Hamachi IP, and put the port as 5555.

If you have no IP, you just put in 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
